Entries.RM.Victor: Oh, this is very nice. Thanks.$h/-7/Uh... I'll take it.$h/-2 -12 -26/Why would I want this?/-4 -5 -6 -27 -75 -80 -79/...Count your days./-20/...I guess I could use this./-81

Entries.2951101/F/f RM.Victor 2500: 50s/17 25/farmer 14 24 1 RM.Victor 19 26 1/skippable/move farmer 3 0 1/move farmer 0 2 2/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection RM.Victor 3/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak RM.Victor "Hello, @. You must be wondering why I needed to talk to you."/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak RM.Victor "I have a proposition to make.#$b#Over the time I've developed an opinion that you're quite reliable."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak RM.Victor "You know how to control your emotions, you are somewhat intelligent...#$b#Tell me, @..."/pause 200/question null "Would you like to become my lab assistant?#What would I have to do?#I don't know..."/pause 200/emote RM.Victor 40/pause 500/speak RM.Victor "Your tasks would include accompaning me here, in the laboratory.#$b#You will do everything I tell you, no matter what it is.#$b#Whether it's handing me something from the table, or getting injured for science, you will do it all.#$b#I'd expect for you to be here for at least 10 hours daily.#$b#So, what do you say?"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/message "Getting injured? And 10 hours? This is too far."/pause 1000/emote RM.Victor 40/pause 1000/emote farmer 60/message "If you want me to spend time with you, you could have just phrased it that way..."/pause 200/emote RM.Victor 60/pause 200/speak RM.Victor "Alright, then. I wish to have you here more often than as of current time...#$b#And you don't need to be assisting. I just need your company.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/emote RM.Victor 60/end

Entries.RM.Victor0: I have to leave the house for our wedding...Ugh...#$b#Is it worth it?#$b#...I'm only kidding, doll. I'm so happy for our special day.$5
Entries.RM.Victor1: None of those people expected for me to ever get married.#$b#Me neither. To be completely transparent with you.#$b#I am indeed happy about it.
